code: import axios from'axios';const API=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'https://mern-todo-app-test-1.onrender.com/api'});API.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});export default API;
